meanings.definition: The activity or business of operating a ranch.
meanings.sent1: Her family has been involved in ranchings for generations.
meanings.sent2: The ranchings in the area have been thriving due to good weather.
meanings.sent3: The ranchings were so busy that even the cows wore cowboy hats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ranchings, she was the undisputed queen of cattle.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the ranchings lingered in the air, a mix of hay and animals.

meanings.definition: The practice of raising livestock on a ranch.
meanings.sent1: Ranchings require dedication and hard work to be successful.
meanings.sent2: The ranchings in Texas focus mainly on cattle and horses.
meanings.sent3: The pig tried to join the ranchings but quickly realized it preferred mud baths.
meanings.sent4: His heart belonged to the open fields and the ranchings under the vast sky.
meanings.sent5: The ranchings at sunset painted a beautiful picture of rural life.
